thread.title_full: excellent, I will come back again !! - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DAOUDASENEGAL
title: excellent, I will come back again !!
text:
I always enjoy staying at this hotel. I appreciate the ideal location , the cleanness of the room and the professional staff always available.
The breakfast is very good and the staff is charge ( Mimish) always available and happy to make you breakfast enjoyable.
